name: narasimha
content: narasimha reddy belongs to first generation.His wife name is laxmidevamma .they have 5 children(venkatreddy,suvarna,prabhakar.madhav and gopalreddys)

name: Laxmidevamma
content: narasimha reddy belongs to first generation.His wife name is laxmidevamma .they have 5 children(venkatreddy,suvarna,prabhakar.madhav and gopalreddys)
